      • withNotFoundOK

        public DtFetchOperation.Builder withNotFoundOK(boolean notFoundOK)
        Set the not_found_ok value.

        If true a vnode returning notfound for a key increments the r tally. False is higher consistency, true is higher availability.

        If not asSet the bucket default is used.

        Parameters:
        notFoundOK - the not_found_ok value.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withBasicQuorum

        public DtFetchOperation.Builder withBasicQuorum(boolean useBasicQuorum)
        Set the basic_quorum value.

        The parameter controls whether a read request should return early in some fail cases. E.g. If a quorum of nodes has already returned notfound/error, don't wait around for the rest.

        Parameters:
        useBasicQuorum - the basic_quorum value.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withTimeout

        public DtFetchOperation.Builder withTimeout(int timeout)
        Set a timeout for this operation.
        Parameters:
        timeout - a timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

        public DtFetchOperation.Builder withSloppyQuorum(boolean sloppyQuorum)
